metadata.calibration_source: WA DOH Respiratory Illness Dashboard, CDC FluView, Pierce County Vaccination Data (2024-2025 season)
data_sources: WA DOH respiratory illness surveillance dashboard
WA DOH Table 6: Influenza vaccination coverage by county (2024-2025)
WA State 2024-2025 flu season data (422 deaths statewide)
metadata.notes: Pierce County calibrated parameters for 2024-2025 flu season. SEVERE SEASON: Highest flu deaths in WA in over a decade (422 statewide). H1N1 and H3N2 co-circulation. Vaccination coverage: 26.5% (down from 27.3% previous season). Peak: January-early February (weeks 1-5). Late December 2024 spike: 5.6% of ED visits in Pierce County. Elderly at highest risk (4.0x baseline). See Docs/Pierce_County_Disease_Parameters_2025.md for full documentation.
